channel.title: math.CT updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.CT updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: $\mathsf{Q}\text{-}\mathbf{Set}$ is not generally a topos
item.description: arXiv:2501.08559v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: For a commutative and divisible quantale $\mathsf{Q}$, it is shown that the category of $\mathsf{Q}$-sets is a topos if, and only if, $\mathsf{Q}$ is a frame.
item.dc:creator: Xiao Hu, Lili Shen

item.title: Comparing $Add(M)$ and $Prod(M)$
item.description: arXiv:2501.08993v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We give characterizations for the inclusions $Add(M)\subseteq Prod(M)$ and $Prod(M)\subseteq Add(M)$ in locally finitely presented categories and in compactly generated triangulated categories.
item.dc:creator: Simion Breaz, Cristian Rafiliu
